title: 3 fresh test failures in master on a build against current git-annex snapshot

labels.name: severity-important
labels.description: major effect on the usability of a package, without rendering it completely unusable to everyone

body:
I guess the result of https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/4838

see https://github.com/datalad/datalad-extensions/runs/1064624383?check_suite_focus=true
<details>
<summary>FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_gitrepo.test_GitRepo_flyweight</summary> 

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_gitrepo.test_GitRepo_flyweight
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.9/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.9/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 731, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.9/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 731, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.9/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/support/tests/test_gitrepo.py", line 1180, in test_GitRepo_flyweight
    assert_equal(1, sys.getrefcount(repo1) - 1)
AssertionError: 1 != 6
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
asyncio: DEBUG: Using selector: EpollSelector
asyncio: DEBUG: Using selector: EpollSelector
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------
```
</details>
